text.p: Integrated Packaging Assembly Corp said it named Patrick Verderico, to the newly created position of executive vice president and chief operating officer.
Verderico has over 20 years of management experience in the semiconductor industry, and over 25 years of experience with high technology companies.

He has served as executive vice president and chief operating officer of Maxtor Corp., chief financial officer at both Creative Technology and Cypress Semiconductor, vice president of assembly operations at Philips Semiconductor, and partner in Coopers and Lybrand's manufacturing consulting practice.
